definition: word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: A Wang is looking for you.
sentences.chinese: 一位姓王的同介词短语志正在找你。

sentences.english: One important syntactic function of preposition phrases is to be the adverbial before subject.
sentences.chinese: 作句首状语是部分介词短语的重要句法功能。

sentences.english: Decide which preposition you need to finish this sentence.
sentences.chinese: 决定你需要那一个介词来完成句子。

sentences.english: Learn some words about places some prep. and adv. How to give directions.
sentences.chinese: 学习地点的一些单词，介词和副词，如何指路。

sentences.english: In one sentence, at most one prepositional phrase is allowed.
sentences.chinese: 在一个句子里，最多只能有一个介词短语。

sentences.english: The depositor positively positioned the preposition in that position on purpose.
sentences.chinese: 储户有意确信地介词放置在那个位置。

sentences.english: Preposition is abbreviated as prep. in this dictionary.
The dative markers are very different in Chinese dialects.
sentences.chinese: 双宾语句中引进与事的介词在汉语方言中颇有歧异。

sentences.english: I can sign the preposition song in my sleep.
sentences.chinese: 我可以在我睡觉的时候谱写介词之歌。

sentences.english: A preposition together with its object is termed " prepositional phrase".
sentences.chinese: 一个介词与它其后的受词一并被称为“介词片语”。

sentences.english: A preposition together with its object is termed " prepositional phrase".
sentences.chinese: 一个介词与它其后的受词一并被称为“介词片语”。

sentences.english: Some adjectives can be used alone, or used with different prepositions.
sentences.chinese: 有些形容词可以单独使用，或后接不同的介词。

sentences.english: This dissertation adopts a functional approach to locative prepositional phrases.
sentences.chinese: 本论文对处所介词短语进行功能研究。

sentences.english: In their research, the prepositional polysemy takes important place.
sentences.chinese: 在他们的领域里，介词多义研究占据重要地位。
